modName: True Daedric Light Armour MESH ONLY
summary: Tried time and time again to get this armour out of Blender and into CK (ARGHGH the brain). Its a basic mesh but I think it has potential
descriptionHtml:
The Armour itself is supposed to be a mix of Daedric Flesh (Daedric Heart) and Daedric Metal. It isn't miles from the original but there is a significant difference in the shape and weight. It is a base mesh with Materials but with no weights or textures. The mesh itself is designed for body type UNP B.2 and is only sized for a weight_0 body, so some tweaking might be needed for other body types. I consider this a 'Skimpy' amour, but that might only be because the regular Daedric Armour is a full suit.

Work In Progress.

Not sure if any additional info is needed.
If you intend to use it feel free just give me a link and props for the mesh.
author: Bravenraven
